mapper.insert: insert into privatefile values(SEQ_PFILENO.NEXTVAL, #{userno}, default, default, default, default, default)
mapper.select: SELECT PFILENO, USERNO, PFILERNAME, PFILETITLE, PFILELASTMODIFIED, PFILECREATEDATE, TRASHCAN, 'private' AS pt FROM PRIVATEFILE WHERE USERNO = #{userno} UNION ALL SELECT PRFILENO, PROJECTNO, PRFILERNAME, PRFILETITLE, PRFILELASTMODIFIED, PRFILECREATEDATE, TRASHCAN, 'team' FROM PROJECTFILE WHERE PROJECTNO IN( SELECT PROJECTNO FROM MEMBER_PROJECT WHERE USERNO = #{userno} ) ORDER BY 5 DESC
select * from (select pfileno from privatefile where userno = #{userno} order by PFILELASTMODIFIED desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: update privatefile set PFILELASTMODIFIED = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') where userno = #{userno} and pfileno = #{pfileno}
update privatefile set pfilethumbnail = #{thumbnail } where userno = #{userno} and pfileno = #{fileno}
